description: Découvrez les meilleurs hôtels à Kyoto, Japan. Trouvez des offres exclusives et des hébergements de luxe.

hotels.title: Grand Opening: Hilltop Kyoto Sanctuary in Higashiyama Gardens with Daily Breakfast & Cocktails
hotels.description: Nestled on a hillside beside the Kiyomizu-dera Temple and surrounded by a bamboo forest, Banyan Tree Higashiyama Kyoto offers a retreat in the heart of Japan’s cultural capital. This newly opened boutique hotel brings together the spirit of a traditional ryokan with contemporary luxury, offering a rare sense of tranquillity just moments from the atmospheric streets of Gion. With just 52 spacious rooms, each elegantly styled with modern Japanese design and sweeping views of Kyoto’s historic cityscape, the hotel offers a heightened sense of privacy, exclusivity and calm. Select rooms feature private onsen baths, while shared indoor-outdoor thermal baths draw from natural hot springs. Guests can unwind with award-winning treatments at the Banyan Tree Spa, enjoy haute Japanese cuisine and curated sake pairings at Ryozen Kaiseki or sip handcrafted cocktails in the bar. The property is also Kyoto’s only hotel to feature a Noh stage, offering curated cultural performances, and the only hotel with a Bamboo Pavilion.

hotels.title: Kyoto Serene Urban Stay near UNESCO World Heritage-listed Nijo Castle Site
hotels.description: Near the majestic Nijo Castle UNESCO heritage site, ANA Crowne Plaza Kyoto, an IHG Hotel, is a tranquil urban escape with stunning views of greenery and seasonal beauty. Take a calming walk through the Nijo Castle grounds while admiring verdant gardens and imposing stone walls. Dine at the multiple onsite restaurants, offering gastronomic greatness. As the day ends, retire to a tranquil guest room that combines refined minimalism with modern comfort for a sound slumber.

hotels.title: Tranquil Mercure Kyoto Escape near Amanohashidate with Onsen Lounge
hotels.description: Embrace pure bliss and discover the ancient beauty of northern Kyoto with a sophisticated stay at this Mercure sanctuary, tucked away in idyllic Miyazu. Set along the shimmering shores of Miyazu Bay, the resort is mere moments from the stunning Amanohashidate Kasamatsu Park - regarded as one of Japan's best viewpoints. Spend your days taking a dip in the seafront, seasonal pool, and relax with traditional onsen experiences, including the hotel's open-air hot spring rock bath. When hunger strikes, savour the local flavours of Kyoto at the onsite restaurant. Venture out to explore the picturesque Wakasa Bay coastline, visit nearby ancient shrines and for something different, make a stop at the unique Red Brick Museum.

hotels.title: Five-Star Boutique Japan Stay with Onsite Fauchon Patisserie & Sweeping Views of Kyoto
hotels.description: Succumb to the allure of Kyoto's vibrant culture, where Parisian style meets Japanese tradition at Fauchon Hotel Kyoto. Incorporating Japanese flavour with iconic French dishes makes this five-star boutique hotel shine. A haven of tradition, art and culture in downtown Kyoto, explore the ancient temples of Higashiyama, the enchanting bamboo groves of Arashiyama and the bustling Nishiki Market. Each space within the hotel is a declaration of French art de vivre and Japanese omotenashi hospitality. Indulge in delectable desserts at Salon De Thé FAUCHON, relax at the luxurious spa, or savour innovative Japanese cuisine with a French flair at The Grand Cafe FAUCHON, offering rare panoramic views of Higashiyama.

hotels.title: Five-Star Kyoto Glamour with Sensory Spa, All-Day Restaurant & Cocktail Bar
hotels.description: Experience Japan's ancient capital with a five-star stay in the heart of Kyoto. Just moments from the historic Gion district and the Kiyomizu-dera Temple, Japan's first instalment of the iconic Six Senses brand is the perfect base for exploring Kyoto's rich cultural heritage. Savour the flavours of traditional Japanese cuisine at the hotel's gourmet Sekki restaurant, rejuvenate with a traditional tea ceremony in the lush garden, or discover sensory therapies at the world-class spa.

hotels.title: Modern Kyoto Stay Near Railway Station with Italian Restaurant & Bar
hotels.description: Discover the ancient charm of Kyoto with a stay at this beautifully designed hotel, conveniently located just minutes from Kyoto Railway Station. This modern retreat is the perfect base to explore the city's countless temples, shrines and teahouses. After a day of exploration, savour the authentic flavours of Italy with a uniquely Japanese twist at onsite Trattoria M Kyoto. Take advantage of Mercure Kyoto Station's central location and immerse yourself in the city's rich culture with a visit to Kyoto National Museum, Fushimi Inari Shrine or Nishiki Market. When it's time to rest, your elegantly appointed room awaits, offering all the modern comforts you might need for a relaxing stay.
